tool.name: python
tool.summary: Sets construction variables for the &python; binary builder.
tool.sets: PYTHON PYCOM PYCOMSTR PYO_FLAGS PYO_CMD PYSUFFIX InstallPython

cvar.name: PYCOM
cvar.summary: The command line used to generate optimized binary from python source file.

cvar.name: PYCOMSTR
cvar.summary:
The string displayed when a file is installed in target directory.
env = Environment(PYCOMSTR = "Installing $SOURCE as $TARGET...")

cvar.name: PYO_FLAGS
cvar.summary: An option passed to the command line to create optimized python binary.

cvar.name: PYO_CMD
cvar.summary: A command passed to python to create optimized python binary.

cvar.name: PYSUFFIX
cvar.summary: When set to 'PYO' compiles source to optimized python binary (ordinary .pyc binary otherwise).
